cause.description:
This cause is conducted by the Health and Medical Association (www.yhma.ca). This association is in direct contact supervision of the Canadian and American Cancer Society. The persons conducting this fundraising are members of the Health and Medical Association and are part of the executive assembly of this volunteer organization. This group does not make any profit from this process and all the financial support is directed towards research in Cancer conducted by the Canadian and American Cancer Society.
1. Find a cure for cancer
2. Create a support network
3. Raise awareness
cause.mission: Collect financial aid for the Canadian and American Cancer Soceity
cause.name: Cancer Research
